events.message: We have received the candidate's application for the software engineer position and have started the review process.
The application has been categorized under Engineering due to relevant software development experience and skills.
A recruiter has been assigned to oversee the candidate's process and ensure timely communication for the engineering role.
The initial screening call was conducted to assess technical knowledge and fit for the developer position.
The candidate responded promptly confirming their availability for the next steps in the interview process.
The technical interview has been scheduled with the engineering team to further evaluate developer skills and problem-solving.
The candidate successfully completed the technical interview demonstrating strong knowledge in software engineering.
The HR interview has been scheduled to discuss cultural fit and salary expectations with the candidate.
HR interview completed successfully and the candidate expressed enthusiasm about joining the engineering team.
An offer was proposed to the candidate with competitive compensation for the software engineer role.
The candidate has provided positive feedback on the offer and expressed interest in moving forward.
The candidate accepted the offer and is excited to start work with the engineering team.
The onboarding process for the new software engineer has begun, including equipment setup and orientation.
The hiring process is officially closed with the successful onboarding of the new engineering team member.
